name: know-b4-phisher
label: KnowB4 PhishER
description: KnowB4 PhishER helps your InfoSec and Security Operations team cut through the inbox noise and respond to the most dangerous threats more quickly.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: api_key
fields.title: API Key
fields.description: API key to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations
fields.tooltip: API key to access the endpoint to connect and perform the automated operations

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is selected, i.e., set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified.

operations.title: Get Messages
operations.description: Retrieves the detailed list of messages based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Specify the lucene query to search and filter the results.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the lucene query to search and filter the results.

parameters.title: Message ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the message ID to fetch the result.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the message ID to fetch the result.

parameters.title: Fetch All Records
parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Select the checkbox to fetch all records at once.
parameters.tooltip: Select the checkbox to fetch all records at once.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. The default value is 1.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. The default value is 1.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.name: per
parameters.description: Specify the number of records that the operation should fetch per page. The minimum value is 25.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records that the operation should fetch per page. The minimum value is 25.

operations.title: Update Message
operations.description: Update a message based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Message ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the message ID of the message that you want to update.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the message ID of the message that you want to update.

parameters.title: Category
parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Specify the category of the message that you want to update.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the category of the message that you want to update.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Specify the status of the message that you want to update.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the status of the message that you want to update.

parameters.title: Severity
parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: Specify the severity of the message that you want to update.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the severity of the message that you want to update.

operations.title: Add Comment
operations.description: Add comment based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Message ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the message ID for which you want to add the comment.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the message ID for which you want to add the comment.

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Specify the comment that you want to add.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comment that you want to add.

operations.title: Add Tags
operations.description: Add tags to a message based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Message ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the message ID for which you want to add the tags.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the message ID for which you want to add the tags.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated value of the tags that you want to add. eg: Tag1,Tag2
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated value of the tags that you want to add.  eg: Tag1,Tag2

operations.title: Remove Tags
operations.description: Remove tags from a message based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Message ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the message ID for which you want to remove the tags.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the message ID for which you want to remove the tags.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated value of the tags that you want to remove. eg: Tag1,Tag2
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated value of the tags that you want to remove.  eg: Tag1,Tag2
